typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		UID as string,
		Attribute as string,
		Text_Response as string,
		Numeric_Response as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		UID as string,
		SLI_ID as string,
		Ops_Report_ID as string,
		Metric_Group as string,
		Metric_Sub_Group as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [UID]\n      ,[SLI_ID]\n      ,[Ops_Report_ID]\n      ,[Metric_Group]\n      ,[Metric_Sub_Group]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Questions]',
	format: 'query') ~> OpsQuestions
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Asset_Name as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Asset_Name]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n  FROM [relational].[Asset]\n  WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> Asset
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
SelectSourceColumns, SelectQuestionKey lookup(UID == Question_UID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LkpOpsQuestionUID
OpsQuestions select(mapColumn(
		Question_UID = UID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectQuestionKey
Asset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Asset_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAssetKey
LkpAsset derive(Validation_Error = iif(isNull(Question_UID)||isNull(Asset_Asset_ID),'Error in UID or Fund or Asset',iif(isNull(toDate(Reporting_Period,'dd/MM/yyyy')),'Error in date',toString(null())))) ~> DerivedValidationError
LkpOpsQuestionUID, SelectAssetKey lookup(Asset_ID == Asset_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Asset_Fund_ID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LkpAsset
DerivedValidationError sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		UID as string,
		Attribute as string,
		Text_Response as string,
		Numeric_Response as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB
